Company: Hoosier Energy Rural Electric Cooperative Inc.
Description: Hoosier Energy Rural Electric Cooperative Inc., an Indiana electric generation and transmission cooperative, agreed to install state-of-the-art pollution control technology at its two coal-fired power plants in Indiana. The settlement required Hoosier to pay a civil penalty of $950,000 and spend $5 million on environmental mitigation projects.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department
